title: Campaign coat (jinbaori)
description: vest-like garment; green wool; horizontal tab with button closure on chest; black frogs with white button holds down vertical front flaps at upper chest; front flaps are metallic gold and tan brocade; yellow wool elements on shoulders embellished with blue crisscross stitching; white wool applique on upper back of three leaves inside a circle; off-white lining fabric woven with white-on-white diamond patterns
creditline: Gift of funds from Kaywin Feldman in memory of Ed Spencer
